statements: SELECT * FROM access_control_lists;
SELECT user_id, user_role FROM access_control_lists ORDER BY user_role DESC;
SELECT user_id, data_access_level FROM access_control_lists WHERE data_access_level >= 3;
SELECT user_id, user_role, data_access_level FROM access_control_lists ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT user_role FROM access_control_lists;
SELECT user_id, user_role, data_access_level FROM access_control_lists WHERE user_role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM access_control_lists WHERE data_access_level > 5 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_role FROM access_control_lists WHERE user_role IN ('admin', 'manager') ORDER BY data_access_level ASC;
SELECT data_access_level, user_id FROM access_control_lists WHERE user_role = 'user' AND data_access_level IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT user_role FROM access_control_lists WHERE user_id < 100;
SELECT * FROM acl_users;
SELECT id, username FROM acl_users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT permission_name FROM acl_permissions WHERE permission_id = 5;
SELECT id, username, password FROM acl_users ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM acl_users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM acl_users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username FROM acl_users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM acl_permissions WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT permission_name, description FROM acl_permissions ORDER BY permission_name DESC;
SELECT id, username, password FROM acl_users JOIN acl_permissions ON acl_users.id = acl_permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND password LIKE '%1234';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE r.role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id ORDER BY r.role_id DESC, u.user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.role_id;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id ORDER BY u.username ASC;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.role_id WHERE u.username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM roles WHERE role_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;

SELECT username, role_name, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
